Experimental multiple trajectory sight for Kanonenjagdpanzer

You can aim HEAT-FS HESH and Machine gun at same time!

This uses highly-experimental awkwardly method, therefore this may be super buggy!

#kanonenjagdpanzer

Some historical user-sights
#wtdraw

Updated: May 17, 2025
1. Redrawn all user-Sights using thousandth scale, so sights can be used as substitute to another vehicle with different sight magnification
2. Sighting scales are now hard-coded, immune to malforming game updates
3. Added new sights

How to Install:
1. Place the files to your WarThunder directory, make sure those .blk files are stored under 'all_tanks' folder
2. Go to Ground Battles setting > Sight setting
3. See picture 1

Sight description:
1. Panzerhaubitze 2000 panoramic
(substitute for) PzH 2000

2. Germa...

Updated version
New custom sights can now be loaded.

How to apply sights
Select ‘future’ from the presets.
Change spectator and save.

Sight colours
Open ‘future.blk’ in UserSights -> tank_sight_presets and change the colour to your preference.
The colours are composed of RGB.

Translations are used in the explanatory text.

#sight #mbt #tank #crosshair #gunsight

Modern Sights
Includes 4 basic versions and 3 requested versions
A version doesnt have the reflex laser shoot feature.

These sights are made for laser rangefinder specifically. The box around the reticle disappears when you zero any distance. They improve reflex laser shooting.


The usage is -> You see enemy far away | Aim and use laser rangefinder | Wait till the box disappears | Shoot instantly when box is gone.

#universal #modern

#senkosan #senko_san #senko #anime #sight #alltanks #wtdraw

Catalyst — a personal sight for all ground vehicles.

Installation:
1. Unzip UserSights.zip into the game folder.
2. Enter a battle or test drive and press the key combination to reload sights (default: ALT + F9).
3. Go to tank battle settings → sight settings, and select Catalyst for the desired vehicle as the reticle.

Updated: 02.03.25

https://images-live.warthunder.com/9ec/c87/000cd16bc37c66b43d3294da0dd5d9978b.png

/Introduction
V1.0 downloads exceeded 150. That was a surprise to me.
I originally started making this for myself, but I couldn't be happier if everyone could use it.

Vanilla Historical Sight Presets V1.1

/Added new presets
2S38, AA, ATGMcross, CV90, MBT

/Adjust transparency and thickness
All Preset

/Explanation
Replicate the historical GPS or FCS look of tanks using the sights provided in War Thunder.

Sight thickness, font size, hue, transparency, layout, have been adjusted.

No custom sight used.

There are 23 sight presets, mainly for MBT and IFV.
